[1;34mrefID: Selection among stored Ref configurations by ID[0m [1;31meval_metrics: Evaluation metrics to use[0m [1;34mcycle_curve_metrics: < No docstring available >[0m [1;31mexclusion_mode: Whether to apply exclusion mode[0m [1;34mexclude_func_name: The function that evaluates exclusion[0m [1;31mfitness_func_name: The function that evaluates fitness[0m [1;34mfit_kws: The target metrics to optimize against[0m [1;31mNgenerations: Number of generations to run for the genetic algorithm engine[0m [1;34mNagents: Number of agents per generation[0m [1;31mNelits: Number of best agents to include in the next generation[0m [1;34mselection_ratio: Fraction of agent population to include in the next generation[0m [1;31mPmutation: Probability of mutation for each agent in the next generation[0m [1;34mCmutation: Fraction of allowed parameter range to mutate within[0m [1;31mbestConfID: ID for the optimized model[0m [1;34minit_mode: Mode of initial generation[0m [1;31mbase_model: Selection among stored Model configurations by ID[0m [1;34mspace_mkeys: Keys of the modules where the optimization parameters are[0m [1;31mBox2D: Whether to use the Box2D physics engine or not.[0m [1;34mlarva_collisions: Whether to allow overlap between larva bodies.[0m [1;31mfr: The tracking/simulation framerate (inverse of timestep) in Hz.[0m [1;34mdt: The tracking/simulation timestep (inverse of tracking framerate) in seconds.[0m [1;31mconstant_framerate: Whether the tracking framerate is constant.[0m [1;34mduration: The duration of the simulation in minutes.[0m [1;31mNsteps: The number of simulation timesteps.[0m [1;34mXY_unit: The spatial unit of the XY coordinate data[0m [1;31mNpoints: The number of points tracked along the larva midline.[0m [1;34mNcontour: The number of points tracked around the larva contour.[0m [1;31mpoint_idx: Index of midline point to use as the larva spatial position. Default is None meaning use the centroid.[0m [1;34mpoint: Midline point to use as the larva spatial position. Default is centroid.[0m [1;31mbend: Whether bending angle is computed as a sum of sequential segmental angles or as the angle between front and rear body vectors.[0m [1;34mfront_vector: The initial & final segment of the front body vector.[0m [1;31mrear_vector: The initial & final segment of the rear body vector.[0m [1;34mfront_body_ratio: The fraction of the body considered front, relevant for bend computation from angles.[0m [1;31muse_component_vel: Whether to use the component velocity ralative to the axis of forward motion.[0m [1;34mid: ID of the simulation. If not specified,set according to runtype and experiment.[0m [1;31mdir: The directory to store data[0m [1;34moffline: Whether to launch a full Larvaworld environment[0m [1;31mmulticore: Whether to use multiple cores[0m [1;34mstore_data: Whether to store the simulation data[0m [1;31mruntype: The simulation mode[0m [1;34mparameters: < No docstring available >[0m
